title: 15 year hence, Priya will be just 4 times as old as she was 15 year ago.Her present age is? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let present age of Priya be P. Age of Priya 15 years hence = P + 15 Age of Priya 15 years ago = P - 15 Thus (P + 15) = 4 * (P - 15) Thus P + 15 = 4P - 60 Thus 15 + 60 = 4P - P Thus 75 = 3P Thus 3P = 75 Thus P = 75 ÷ 3 Thus P = 25

Her present age is 25 years. Solution:- Let her present age be x 15 years later ,her age will be (x+ 15) 15 years ago, her age would be ( x-15) According to question (x+15)= 4(x-15) Therefore x = 25 So she's 25 years old. Corrections are appreciated.
